edited_stories.edited_story_text: We were all gathered together. The family was whole for this occasion. Filled with cheer and delight, the girls laughed with each other over stories and gossip. The children enjoyed themselves, occupied with phantom activities manifested from imagination. And best of all was the food. Cuisine which could compel warmth and love, purely from devouring a single morsel.
